boardgame.name: Carrera Mice
Dzielne myszki
Kazensnaaiers
Mlsné myšky
Ratones a la Carrera
Sajtbirodalom
Viva Topo!
起司天堂
boardgame.description: In Viva Topo!, players attempt to advance their mice (pieces) from the start to any of various goals. The further the goal, the more cheese (points) it is worth. Pursuing the mice is the cat that removes the mice from the game should it catch the mice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Movement is regulated by a die which has 1/1/2/3/4/5 on the sides. The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; sides also move the cat. Initial cat moves are only one space, but become two spaces after once around the track, so when the cat speeds up, the game is almost all over!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Viva Topo! is a family game that has players balancing risk and rewards as they attempt to outrun the cat and score for cheese._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2003 Japan Boardgame Prize Best Childgame Winner

Rio Grande Games (RIO 358) Type: Race Number of players: 2-4 Age of players: 4++ Length: 20-30 minutes minutes Game Description: An adventurous expedition to paradise. A tactical chasing family game for 2-4 children from 4 years. Short description: Which mouse familiy doesn’t want to live in a cheesy paradise world? A possibly perilous expedition leads you to a fantasy land filled with delicious pieces of cheese. Every step you take will be followed by a hungry cat - a dangerous journey! The winners at the end of the expedition is the mouse family with the most pieces of cheese. Author: Manfred Ludwig
